website_summaries.verdict: A rich, soothing shower gel that leaves you smelling clean and fresh without being overwhelming.
pros: Made with organic verbena extract that soothes and tones the skin
Clean, fresh scent that isn't overpowering
Doesn't leave a residue on your skin
cons: Can be drying if used too frequently

customer_reviews.title: smells *so* good- cool and crisp and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of the best shower gels I've ever used- the scent is BEAUTIFUL and just like the plant. It's crisp and cool and green and light and not cloying at all. The shower gels foams beautifully, rinses clean, and is lightly scented but fragranced enough that you can smell it lightly on your skin after your shower. I wish L'Occitane could capture this *exact* fragrance in the lotion versions of Verbena (which are lovely, but not quite the same) but the whole collection is still perfection.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. & T.M.

customer_reviews.title: L'Occitance Vervain Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: This lemony scent is incredible and is the only brand the Four Seasons hotel offers its guests. Its clean, welcoming, yet not over powering. It lathers well and I like using a moderate amount of anything so this is typical for my usage. This bottle lasts me about one month or a few days shy. Will always recommend to those who like citrus scents.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Educator

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick with the lemon bath and body works gel.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. My friend brought back this collection from a resort in Mexico and i loved the smell. I love lemons and the scent really stayed. So i splurged and ordered this. But it's really runny. Not gel like as you would think of most shower gels or washes. And I'm pretty sure this one is making me break out. The container is also a lot smaller then I was expecting. It's more like a $10 bottle size like from bath and body works. Definitely not $20. And since its more runny you go through it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Coalerz

customer_reviews.title: L'Occitane Verbena Shower Gel, 8.4 Fl Oz
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different shower gels in the past, but this is the only product that my skin is not allergic to. If I could find a cheap shower gel that does not irritate my skin, I would definitely go for it, but this is the only choice I've got for now. Would I recommend it? If your skin is like mine, sure! Go for it! However, if your skin can take whatever, there are plenty of cheaper options out there.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bottle
customer_reviews.text: The contents are good, but I come to praise the bottle, which from a (very short) distance could be mistaken for cut glass. Its retangular shape and "chiseled" decoration is a miracle of plastic engineering. Safe yet pretty, and easier to hold on to for small and arthritic fingers alike than the company's usual round bottle. The top flips open and shut. This formula seems to foam more readily than others. A very pretty gift.
